jd: From: shiva prasad, HCL global systems shiva@hclglobal.com Reply to: shiva@hclglobal.com Hi,I hope you are well.I request you to go through the below requirements help me with updated resume, Technical PM/Project coordinatorLocation: Los Angeles, USA(Hybrid)Must Have Skills –Skill 1 – Yrs of Exp – 10+ - Project manager/coordinatorSkill 2 – Yrs of Exp – Cloud migrationSkill 3 – Yrs of Exp – AWSJD:Technical Project Manager (Cloud Migration - AWS)Responsibilities:- Manage cloud migration and enablement projects, specifically in AWS environments.- Coordinate with technical teams to ensure smooth and efficient project execution.- Develop and maintain project timelines, budgets, and documentation.- Identify risks and issues, proposing solutions to mitigate them.Qualifications:- Experience in managing cloud migration projects, preferably in AWS.- Experience in Managing AWS Application Development and Support Projects- Understanding of cloud architecture and services.- Proactive and responsible individual with excellent problem-solving abilities.
